Package it.polimi.softeng.controller

Class TileController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.controller.TileController
public class TileController extends Object
Controller class that handles islands, clouds and the movement of mother nature

  • Method Details

    • genIslands

      public ArrayList<Island_Tile> genIslands(int num, Bag_Tile bag)
      This method is used to generate and initialize the islands of the current game
      Parameters:
      num - the number of islands to be generated
      bag - the Bag_Tile object of the current game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Island_Tile the list of generated islands

    • genClouds

      public ArrayList<Cloud_Tile> genClouds(int num, int max, Bag_Tile bag)
      This method is used to generate and initialize the cloud tiles of the current game
      Parameters:
      num - the number of cloud tiles to be generated
      max - the maximum number of student disks that can be held on a cloud tile
      bag - the Bag_Tile object of the current game
      Returns:
      ArrayList Cloud_Tile the generated cloud tiles

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(Player p, int n, CharCardController charCardController, ArrayList<Player> players, ArrayList<CharacterCard> cards, ArrayList<Island_Tile> islands, PlayerController playerController) throws ExceededMaxMovesException, MoveNotAllowedException, GameIsOverException
      This method is used to move mother nature across the islands
      Parameters:
      p - the player who want to perform the operation
      n - the number of movement that we want mother nature to perfom
      charCardController - the charCardController of the current game
      players - list of all the players of the current game
      cards - list of the usable character cards of this game
      islands - list of the islands of this game
      playerController - the playerController of this game
      Returns:
      boolean true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ExceededMaxMovesException - when the player wants to move mother nature more than possible
      MoveNotAllowedException - if n is negative
      GameIsOverException - when

    • moveStudentsToIsland

      public void moveStudentsToIsland(Player p, Colour c, String islandID, ArrayList<Island_Tile> islands) throws TileNotFoundException, InsufficientResourceException
      This method is used to move students from the entrance of a schoolboard to an Island
      Parameters:
      p - the player who want to perform the operation
      c - the colour of the student disk the player wants to move
      islandID - the ID of the island where the player wants to move the student disk
      islands - list of the islands of this game
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException - when the islandID isn't found
      InsufficientResourceException - when there isn't any student of the wanted colour in the player's entrance

    • refillClouds

      public void refillClouds(ArrayList<Cloud_Tile> clouds, Bag_Tile bag)
      This method is used to fill the clouds from the bag
      Parameters:
      clouds - the list of all the clouds of the current game
      bag - the Bag_Tile object of the current game

    • refillEntranceFromCloud

      public void refillEntranceFromCloud(Player p, String cloudID, ArrayList<Cloud_Tile> clouds) throws TileNotFoundException, TileEmptyException, MoveNotAllowedException
      This method refills school board entrance from cloud
      Parameters:
      p - the player whose school board must be filled
      cloudID - the id of the chosen cloud
      clouds - the ArrayList of clouds in the game
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException - if no cloud with the chosen id was found
      TileEmptyException - if chosen cloud has no disks
      MoveNotAllowedException - if trying to refill an entrance with less empty spots than disks on the cloud

    • calculateInfluence

      public void calculateInfluence(Player conqueringPlayer, Island_Tile island, ArrayList<Player> players, CharCardController charController, ArrayList<CharacterCard> cards, PlayerController playerController) throws GameIsOverException
      This method calculates the influence on an island after it's conquered, and swap team towers if necessary
      Parameters:
      conqueringPlayer - the player who conquered the island
      island - the island which got conquered
      players - all the players of the current game
      charController - the character card controller of the current game
      cards - all the usable character cards of the current game
      playerController - the player controller of the current game
      Throws:
      GameIsOverException - when the game finishes

    • checkAndMerge

      public void checkAndMerge(ArrayList<Island_Tile> islands, Island_Tile island)
      This method is used to check if an island needs to be unified to its adjacent islands
      Parameters:
      islands - all the islands present in the game
      island - the island who needs to be checked
